results.content: I am completely new to the field of coding. This course is as advertised. It is for beginners like me and I love it! I especially love the what I call, "test your knowledge" parts of certain sections. It's called practices, but you can pause the video and challenge yourself to complete the practice before doing it with the professor.

results.content: What I was looking for in a course is precise knowledge and practice. That is exactly what I got, love the lector. 10/10 will come again :)

results.content: The content is easy to understand and follow so far and its perfect for a beginner looking to go into a new career.
